About Me

My name is Marlon Maniti and I am a Front-end Web Developer and UX Designer. I have been designing for the web since 2011 and have a BA in Information Technology Major in Multimedia.

I am a perfectionist with a real passion for design and development on the web. I specialize in creating attractive, accessible, fun and friendly websites built upon a solid foundation of semantic markup, placing great importance on the latest web standards
